metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0038 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the xfs_acl_from_disk function in fs/xfs/xfs_acl.c inthe Linux kernel before 3.1.9 allows local users to cause a denial ofservice (panic) via a filesystem with a malformed ACL, leading to aheap-based buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0038` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-extra-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-1-goldfish - 3.4.0-1.9
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-3-mako - 3.4.0-3.21
No subscription required

No subscription required
